thread.title: Luring Millennials Into the Concert Hall

author: Terry Teachout
title: Luring Millennials Into the Concert Hall
text: Everybody in the fine arts is asking the same question: How do you persuade millennials, accustomed as they are to the split-second convenience of hand-held on-demand entertainment, to get off their couches and see your shows? Some of the...
